amendment.description: To modify the requirements for confidentiality certain information submitted by an alien seeking an adjustment of status under section 245B.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4097 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 151.

action.text: Amendment SA 4097 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S5135-5141; text: CR S5135-5136) To modify the requirements for confidentiality certain information submitted by an alien seeking an adjustment of status under section 245B.
